traits.label: Spellcasting
traits.description:
Modifier: Charisma
Spell Save DC: 14
Spell Attack Bonus: 6

traits.label: Armor of Shadows
traits.description: You can cast Mage Armor on yourself without expending a spell slot

traits.label: Pact of the Blade
traits.description: You may bond or summon a pact weapon. You may use Charisma modifier instead of Strength or Dex. You may cause the damage type to be Radiant, Psychic, or Necrotic instead

traits.label: Cantrips
traits.description:
Mind Sliver
Blade Ward
Friends
Druidcraft

traits.label: Mask of Many Faces
traits.description: You can cast Disguise Self without expending a spell slot

traits.label: Elven Lineage - Wood Elf
traits.description: You always have Longstrider prepared and can cast it without expending a spell slot

traits.label: Actor
traits.description: While disguised, you have advantage on Deception and Performance checks to convince others you are that person. You can mimic the sounds of other creatures, including speech. A creature that hears the mimicry must succeed on a spell DC Insight check to tell its fake

traits.label: 1st Level Spells
traits.description:
Comprehend Languages
Faerie Fire
Longstrider
Sleep
Tasha's Hideous Laughter

traits.label: Magical Cunning
traits.description: You can perform an esoteric rite for 1 min to regain half your maximum spell slots, rounded up

traits.label: Trance
traits.description: You can long rest in 4 hours by entering a trancelike meditation in which you retain conciousness. Magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.label: Steps of the Fey
traits.description:
You may cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot. When you cast it choose one:
After teleporting, one creature you can see within 10ft gains 1d10 temporary hit points
Creatures within 5ft of your previous space must succeed on a wisdom save or have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you until the start of your next turn

traits.label: 2nd Level Spells
traits.description:
Calm Emotions
Crown of Madness
Mirror Image
Misty Step
Phantasmal Force
Suggestion

traits.label: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 60ft

traits.label: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the charmed condition

personality: Emerryl is a creature of contradictions: otherworldly and ethereal, yet chilling in manner and detached in empathy. Their allure is undeniable, yet unsettling, an embodiment of the fey's glamour and terror. Emerryl finds beauty in despair and intrigue in the suffering of others, viewing human emotions as curiosities to be prodded and observed. Though often cruel, they are driven by the whim of their patron and an almost scholarly desire to uncover the limits of mortal endurance and resolve.
